#include<iostream>
#include<cstring>
using namespace std;
int setValue(int arr[],int num){
int i=2;
int carry=0;
int pos=0;
int j=0;
arr[0]=1;
while(i<=num){
j=0;
carry=0;
while(j<=pos){
arr[j]=arr[j]*i+carry;
carry=arr[j]/10;
arr[j]=arr[j]%10;
j++;
}
while(carry>0){
arr[++pos]=carry%10;
carry=carry/10;
}
i++;
}
return pos;
}
void displayValue(int arr[],int size){
int i=size;
while(i>=0){
cout<<arr[i];
i--;
}
cout<<endl;
}
int main(){
int T,N;
int size;
cin>>T;
while(T>0){
cin>>N;
int arr[500];
memset(arr,0,sizeof(arr));
size=setValue(arr,N);
displayValue(arr,size);
T--;
}
return 0;
}
